article_title: 5 Issues Gov't Contractors Need To Know About In 2015
article_text:
5 Issues Gov't Contractors Need To Know About In 2015

Law360, Washington (January 7, 2015, 9:41 PM ET) -- The federal government will continue its rigorous enforcement efforts and its push for more access to private contractor data in 2015, creating a diverse range of challenges that government contractors should be aware of, attorneys say.



Here are some of the issues federal contractors should pay attention to in 2015, Crowell & Moring LLP attorneys said in their preview of the year ahead.



Congress Clashing With the White House



With the Republican Party now in control of both the House and the Senate, government contractors should be...
